text: Caran d'Ache is a Swiss manufacturing company of art materials and writing instruments. The company, established in 1915, produces a wide range of products including colored pencils, graphite pencils, pastels, fountain pens, ballpoint pens, mechanical pencils, markers, gouache paints, and ink cartridges. ==Colors== Category:1910s establishments in Switzerland Category:1915 establishments in Europe Category:Manufacturing companies of Switzerland
title: Caran d'Ache (company)
